attributes.action: Ask all Members of Parliamnet to sign Early Day Motion (EDM) 247
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are writing to ask you to support a new ASLEF campaign to protect the H&S of train drivers & the general public. In particular I am asking you to sign parlimentary EDM 247 which states:

That this house is concerned by the report form the Rail Safety & Standards Board (RSSB) which found a dramatic increase in the number of signals passed at danger (SPAD) in July 2006 to 42 incidents an increase of 62% compared with the same period in 2005, & 20% higer than the previous 3 year average, when weather temperatures were much lower; concerned that the extremely high temperatures of July 2006 affected the performance of train drivers, thereby increasing the number of SPADS & compromising the safety of drivers & the general public; calls upon train operating companies to ensure that all train cabs are fitted with sustainable air temperature control devices.

I hope that as our Prime Minister we can count on your support.
